findings.title: Minting of unlimited number of sundae tokens
Incorrect comment on extractSign
findings.description: The comment on extractSign should indicate the case for zero (1 means the number is non-negative)

findings.title: Incorrect comment on L138-139 for donateLiquidity
findings.description: The LP does not receive share tokens in this case.

findings.title: Contract Stores Its Own Balance For Calculation Instead Of Utilising Real-Time Token Contract Value
findings.description: The system stores its own balance data for calculation instead of utilising real-time token contract data. This could lead to faulty calculation when non-standard tokens are used.

findings.title: Possible Reward Truncation
findings.description: In `setRewardRate` function of `RewardDistribution.sol`, line 61 may truncate unfinished reward distribution.

findings.title: calculateCashToReturn Does Not Exclude Perpetuals
findings.description: The function `calculateCashToReturn` assumes that the context is fully prepared without excluding any perpetuals.

findings.title: rebalance Does Not Have a Return Value
findings.description: The `rebalance` function does not have a return value; this may lead to undesirable results or wasted computation.

findings.title: Incorrect Constants
findings.description: There is an error in `validateBaseParameters` : `INDEX_OPEN_SLIPPAGE_FACTOR` is used instead of `INDEX_MAINTENANCE_MARGIN_RATE` to validate the liquidation penalty parameter.

findings.title: Incorrect Data Representation
findings.description: There is a difference in the representation of `int256 deltaPosition` between `liquidateByAMM` and `liquidateByTrader`, which may cause confusion in the future.

findings.title: Omitted Event
findings.description: SetOracle event from module/PerpetualModule.sol is not included.

findings.title: Missing Argument
findings.description: `OperatorCheckIn` event should contain `address indexed operator` as an argument.

findings.title: Gas Usage / for Loop Concerns
findings.description: Gas usage is a main concern for smart contract developers and users, since high gas costs may prevent users from wanting to use the smart contract. Even worse, some gas usage issues may prevent the contract from providing services entirely.

findings.title: Integer Overflow / Underflow
findings.description: Integer overflow/underflow occur when an integer hits its bit-size limit.

findings.title: Possibly Incorrect Revert Condition In validateBaseParameters
findings.description: The revert message is inconsistent with the revert condition.

findings.title: End User Can Pretend To Be A Broker Or Relayer
findings.description: In the function `brokerTrade`, a user can interact with `Perpetual.sol` directly by giving it a manipulated `OrderData` that seems to be sent by a broker, from a relayer.
